welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kemigawa, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, delicious cuisine, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all the unique experiences this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal of Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'HND Free Wi-Fi' from the available networks and following the instructions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal primarily used by low-cost carriers and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used exclusively by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network by selecting the network and following the instructions on the login page.
